111.content:
It was a normal day for the Russos. Alex, Justin, and Max were in a wizard lesson with their father Jerry. When they finished, Jerry told them to keep practicing while he went and took care of something in the shop. Alex, like always, fell asleep during the lesson and was laying on the couch. Justin and Max decided to practice without her.

"Okay, what spell should we practice?" Justin asked.

"Oooh, how about the one where we can poof up popcorn." Max responded.

"That's stupid." Justin smirked and looked in the book for a different spell. "Oh how about this one, a shrink spell."

"Oh yeah, then I can find the ants that stole my cookie last week." Max replied. Justin just facepalmed.

"Okay so here it goes." Justin said as he prepared the spell.

"What about Alex?" Max asked as they both looked at her sleeping on the couch.

"Whatever. Not my problem that she'll fail the wizard exam. Okay let's do this." Justin answered. Then, he stated the spell, "Shrinky dink, shrinky dank, shrinky dunk, shrinky us." And both Max and Justin started to shrink. "It's working!" He shouted. When it was finished they found themselves the size of 1 inch. They explored a bit. Max was having fun, but Justin got bored of being small. "Alright Max that's enough, let's grow back."

"Fine." he responded. Justin then stood still for a few seconds with a still look on his face. "What wrong?" Max asked.

"I don't have the spell to grow back!" Justin panicked. Justin then thought of something. "Alex!" He thought of. He turned to the couch and looked up and saw her sleeping on the couch. They decide to get her help. Although Justin does not expect her full cooperation. She'll probably make fun of Justin for this situation. But they needed to grow back. Alex-
111.title: Wizards of Waverly Place

1111.content: Max and Justin started walking towards the couch. As they were walking they saw the Giant Alex move. Her two feet came off the couch and on the floor. They saw her enormous converse shoes and froze in shock. Alex got up and looked around. "Everyone left without telling me. That's cool." she smirked and started walking. Each time she took a step Justin and Max couldn't keep their balance and they fell. After a few steps she paused and noticed something on the ground.
1111.title: Wakes up

11111.content:
Alex looks down at the floor and sees her miniaturized brothers next to her massive foot. She picks them up and heads towards her bedroom. Alex then puts her tiny sized brothers on her bed while simultaneously taking off her socks, shirt, and shorts.

Alex lies down on her bed while placing her gigantic feet next to Justin and Max. They instantly cover their noses from noticing the really strong odor coming from Alex’s billboard sized feet.

“Ha, this is great, you two have shrunk which means that both of you will worship me.” Alex says.

“Alex, you need to find the spell that restores mine and Max’s height.” Justin insists.

“Nah, I don’t feel like it. Both of you better start rubbing my feet if you guys want to live. Alex laughs.

Do Justin and Max obey Alex or figure out an escape plan?
11111.title: She sees them

choices: Decided to look under the sofa
11112.content:
Max and Justin looked up and saw their titanic sister looking down at them. At first they were relieved that she saw them. But she shrieked, "Ewww bugs!" Justin ran for it but Max stupidly stayed and said, "Bugs? Where?" He looked around. Alex lifted her foot up and smiled. Justin got away safely while she was toying with Max. Max was still standing there.

"Max run!" Justin shouted. Max started to run.

"Not so fast!" Alex playfully said and she slammed her foot on Max. She crushed him in an instant. She twisted her foot, squishing the last remains. Justin looked on in horror. He just watched his sister kill their brother. Alex giggled and lifted her foot revealing a stain of blood on the floor. Justin sobbed.

"Now where did the other bug go." Alex whispered. Justin remained hiding under the sofa. Alex looked around for him. After a minute she,
11112.title: She mistakes them as bugs

1112.content:
was still asleep. They needed to wake her up. Justin walked towards the couch and Max followed. They looked up trying to find a way to get up there.

"I think we can climb up by the edge of the couch." Max said.

"Okay good. So climb up there and wake up Alex." Justin responded.

"Why aren't you coming?" Max asked.

"Well you know I'm all sore from working out earlier, and I probably don't have enough energy to climb." Justin lied.

"Yeah and I had breakfast with King Kong earlier. Whatever, I'll climb up." Max walked towards the edge of the couch and started to climb. It was difficult to climb. After a few minutes, he reached the top of the couch. He saw Alex still sleeping. She was wearing a light blue top, dark blue jeans, and white socks. She kicked off her black converse shoes when she was sleeping to get comfortable. Max needed to wake her up. Since her feet were vulnerable, he could try tickling her feet. Or he could try waking her up by shouting in her ear. Or possibly another way. Max decided to wake her up by
1112.title: Still asleep

11121.content:
Max jumped down onto the cushion and walked towards her feet. She was enormous compared to him. Max carefully got close to her feet. As he approached it, he could smell the awful stench. It was horrible but he needed to wake her up. He started to tickle her sole. After a few seconds, he saw her toes wiggle. He continued to tickle her. After a few more seconds, she woke up. She reached for her feet with her hand. Max got out of the way as she scratched the spot max with tickling. She looked near her foot and saw Max, not initially recognizing him. She grabbed him with her hand and brought it closer to get a good look. Then, she recognized it was Max.

"Max?! Is that you? How'd you get so small?" she freaked out.

"Justin shrunk us and we don't know how to grow back. Help!" Max yelled.

"Justin..." Alex then had a smile on her face. She then got off the couch and slid on her shoes. "

Does she find Justin?
11121.title: tickling her

112.content:
The story begins in the Twins room. Zack was laying on the bed reading a sports magazine and Cody was working on his, or should I say their, science fair project. After many tough hours, Cody finally finished.

"There. They thought it couldn't be done, but I proved them wrong!" Cody gloated.

"What are you talking about dork?" Zack asked. He got of the bed and walked towards the experiment. "What's this remote?"

"A scientifically device that is capable of reducing the mass of atoms and extracting-" Cody explained.

"In English!" Zack interrupted

"It can shrink things." Cody replied. Zack then aimed the gun at the plant at hit the big button on the remote. "Wait Zack we don't kno-" Cody said trying to stop him. The plant shrunk to tiny size.

"Woah it works." Zack exclaimed. He then thought of what he could use the remote for.

"We can only use it for scientific reasons. Not just shrinking anything because we can." Cody worried.

"Aha I have an idea." Zack grinned. "This device can shrink people too right?" he asked.

"Yes, but why..."

"I'm going to shrink and spy on my love, Maddie." Zack responded.

"Oh no. We'll get in trouble and what if-" Cody tried to stop Zack but he didn't listen.

"Okay, we'll
112.title: Suite Life

choices: She drops the key near Zack and Cody
1121.content:
Zack left the room and out of the apartment. Cody followed but only because he couldn't get the device from Zack. They entered the elevator and Zack hit ground floor. They walked out of the hotel and towards where Maddie lived. After about 10 minutes they got to the building. They entered and headed to her apartment. When they got to the apartment, Cody once again tried to stop Zack from doing it. But Zack ignored it. He aimed the remote and Cody and hit the button. He shrunk. He then aimed it at himself and did the same thing. After a few seconds. Both of them were around the size of an inch.

"Nice going. Now we're tiny." Cody whined.

"Would you be quiet. Now hide behind the plant so no one sees us." Zack ordered. They both walked behind the plant and hid until Maddie came home. After around a half-hour waiting, they heard someone walking down the hall. Zack carefully peeked out to see who it was, and it was indeed Maddie. She was wearing her school uniform. She wore a blue plaid skirt, a school shirt, black knee high socks, and black loafers. She stopped at the door and reached for the key in her bag. She was gigantic compared to them. Zack used this opportunity to look up through her skirt to see her panties. He saw that she was wearing blue and white panties. He was in heaven and got an erection. It was such a beautiful sight. Meanwhile, Cody was fascinated by her feet. He secretly had a foot fetish, and was intrigued by her giant feet.

Maddie got the key out of her bag and proceeded to open the door. And
1121.title: Go to Maddie's apartment

Maddie put her bag down and removed her shoes revealing her socked foot. Zack runs to try and get another peek of Maddie's panties, but Maddie goes off to
11212.title: She opens the door

Maddie started to undress. First, she took off her socks and threw them on the floor near Cody. Cody looked at the giant socks and tried to resist. But he couldn't. He ran to them and started smelling them. They smelled awful, but it turned Cody on. Cody continued to smell them while Maddie undressed. She took off her skirt revealing her full panties. Zack was in awe. She threw them ontop of the socks, and ontop of Cody. Then, she took off her shirt revealing her bra. And threw the shirt on the pile of clothes on the floor. Zack never saw something so beautiful. Finally, Maddie picked up the clothes, with Cody in it, and threw it in the hamper. Zack looked around for Cody but couldn't see him. "Oh no, Cody!" Zack panicked but was still amazed by Maddie. Maddie got dressed for
112121.title: Change

Maddie walked back to the dresser. Zack wanted to help Cody, but the view from down there was too good to ignore. Zack got closer to Maddie. She started to get dressed for work. First, she put on the Tipton shirt. Then, she put on a skirt. Finally, she put on blue argyle knee-high socks. When she was putting on her socks, she spotted something in the corner in her eye. She looked down and saw Zack, but to her it looked like a bug.

"Aww hey little guy, how'd you get in here?" She said. Zack was frozen. Maddie lifted her foot getting ready to squish Zack. Maddie sent her foot crashing down and
1121211.title: Work

Zack managed to evade her foot. He jumped at the last minute and made it under the dresser. He immediately got up and ran to the back. Maddie checked the bottom of her sock to see if she got him. But she missed him. She looked at the clock on the wall and noticed the time.

"I don't have time for this." She moaned. Maddie
11212112.title: Zack evaded her foot

112121122.content:
Maddie walked away from the dresser towards the door. She put on her boots and she left the apartment for work. Zack ran out from under the dresser. He had enough fun and wanted to return to normal. But he needed Cody, who was in the hamper. Zack thought about the best way to get in there. After a few minutes he came up with a plan. He could climb the window curtain and jump in from there. He ran towards the curtain and started climbing. He carefully climbs his way up. Around 10 minutes later, he reaches half-way, which is enough to jump into the hamper. He was hesitant to jump, but he finally got the courage to jump. From his size, it was a long fall. But, his fall was cushioned when he landed on clothing. He layed there for a few seconds.

"Cody, are you here?" Zack shouted.

"Zack? How'd you get in here?" Cody asked.

"Nevermind that, we need to get back to normal. Climb up here and grow us." Zeck yelled.

He digged through dirty smelly laundry, which included shirts, pants, skirts, socks, and panties. Zack got distracted when he found her panties. He couldn't resist sniffing them. Likewise, Cody got distracted when he found her socks. They spend hours digging through the clothes, and
112121122.title: Leaves for work

He went to his room and sat down and began to look inside the box. After going through mostly junk, he found some weird remote. A note was tied to it and he read it. It said that the remote was a shrink and it contained instructions on how to operate it. "This is stupid." He thought to himself. Then, he set it down and began to think. He then realized he could have a lot of fun with the remote. And by fun, he meant perverted fun. He could shrink down and spy on Carly when she's changing. But then again he could show it to Sam or Carly. Freddie eventually decides to
121.title: iCarly

1211.content: He decided to have some perverted fun. Freddie left the apartment and headed across the hall. He knocked on the door and no one answered. Carly must not be home yet. He then grabbed the hidden key that was by the plant and used it to open the door. When he went in no one was there. Where does he shrink?
1211.title: Spy on Carly

1212.content:
He went across the hall to Carly's apartment. Sam was sitting on the couch watching tv.

"Sam look I've found." Freddie said holding up the remote. Sam got up and walked towards him.

"What is it, another stupid geek toy?" Sam remarked.

"No. This is a shrink-ray." Freddie said.

"Nu-uh." Sam grabbed the remote from his hand and inspected it. She pressed a button and a laser shot at Freddie. He started to shrink. Eventually, he shrunk down the size of an inch. "No way!" Sam thought. "It actually worked. Hmm this gives me an idea." She looked around. "Freddie? Where'd you go?" she sarcastically said. "Oh well." she looked and saw him on the floor. "Eww gross a bug!" she said but obviously knew it was Freddie.

"Very funny Sam! Now grow me back!" Freddie yelled.

"Better take care of it." She said and lifted her foot above him. Freddie stayed still thinking she wouldn't do it, but then realized it was Sam and probably would do it. He tried running and Sam slammed her foot down almost crushing him.
1212.title: Show it to Sam

1311.content:
Will was watching TV on a Saturday afternoon. Carl and Uncle Phil were out of town. Will recently had a secret date with another girl last night. He knew it was wrong to cheat on Lisa, but that girl was so hot. But he made sure that Lisa wouldn't find out. After watching TV for awhile, he heard Lisa come into the room.

"Oh hey Lisa." Will said.

"Hey my big sexy man." Lisa blemished as she sat down next to Will. "I brought you a homemade cookie. I used my secret ingredient."

"Don't mind if I do." Will said as he grabbed the cookie. He ate the cookie and it tasted delicious. "Mmm delicious. What was the secret ingredient?" Will asked.

"Some special shrinking nuts." she answered. Will was confused. "I know you cheated on me last night, and now you will be punished."

"What are you-" Will stopped speaking when he felt his stomach bubbling. He felt sick and dizzy. He felt himself spinning around. He was shrinking. Eventually he stopped shrinking at around an inch tall. Lisa stood up. Will looked up at how gigantic she was. She was looking down at him smiling.

"Well Will, how does it feel to be so tiny and weak?" she mocked him.

"Change me back!" Will shouted but she couldn't hear him.

"You have no respect for women. I hope now you'll have respect for them considering one can easily end your pathetic little life." she said as she raised her right foot over his body. Will was scared and immediately ran for under the couch. Bam! Her foot came crashing down and Will barely avoided her giant shoe. He quickly got back up and ran under the couch. "Aww come on Will, play with me." she said. Will was catching his breathe under the couch. He was scared of his situation. Lisa waited for Will to come out, but he didn't. "Fine, I'll just wait till you want to play." She sat down on the couch and grabbed a magazine to read. She took off her shoes to get comfortable, revealing her red socks.

Will waited a few minutes to see if she'd do anything, but she didn't. She was still reading the magazine. Will didn't want to get her attention, but he had to. She was probably the only one that could help him. Perhaps if he apologized she would forgive him. Will walked out from under the couch. He looked up and she was busy reading. He tried yelling to get her attention.

"Yo Lisa, I'm sorry, I made a terrible mistake!" he shouted but she didn't hear him. He thought of other ways to get her attention. Perhaps if he tickled her feet she would notice. He walked closer to her feet. As he got closer, he could smell how awful the stench was. But he needed her attention. He started tickling her socked foot hoping she would feel it. She wiggled her toes and Will looked up. She put the magazine down and looked down at Will.

"Well well well, what do we have here? A pesky little bug. You know what I do to little bugs like you, I squish 'em." she mocked Will. She stood up towering over Will. She lifted up her right foot over Will. She wiggled her toes, teasing him. Will stared at the giant foot and realized getting her help was useless. He tried running back under the couch. She slammed her foot causing Will to fall down. He quickly got up and busted under the couch. "Aww come out little buggy, I just want to play." she teased. Will needed to escape. He-

13112.content:
Will ran from behind the couch trying to get away from Lisa. Since no one else was home, he needed to hide until someone came home.

"Will, where are you my little man?" she yelled. Will turned around and saw she was walking around looking for him. He needed to hide fast. He noticed one of Ashley's sneakers on the ground, so he quickly jumped in. It smelled awful but he needed to hide. Lisa continued looking for him. Will just waited in the shoe. Does Lisa find him?
13112.title: runs behind the couch

131122.content:
Will waited awhile. Eventually he was surprised.

"How many times have I told Ashley not to leave her shoes lying around the house?" a voice said. Will recognized the voice as Vivian. He saw her hand grab the shoe. He quickly got up to get her attention but was lost balance when she picked him up with the shoe. He fell to the toe section and couldn't move to her hand.
131122.title: No

131211.content:
It was the summer break at the banks house. Uncle Phil and Carlton had gone on a summer long camping trip, they invited Will but he refused saying he'd rather watch paint dry.

One day Will went out to relax with his friends leaving the girls at home by their selves because Vivian gave Geoffrey the summer off. They were watching TV when the doorbell rang and they went to open it.

A policeman had Will in cuffs and told the girls that he had been up to no good so he arrested him and brought him to his home. Aunt viv thanked the officer before closing the door.

"Will this is the third time this summer youve been in trouble with the police. Now I have no choice but to punish you" Aunt Viv said. "Can we help" Hilary and Ashley said at the same time. "Of course you can girls" Vivian replied.

The first thing they did was shrink Will to 1 foot tall so he could be more manageable. Who was the first one to punish Will.
131211.title: Will

131221.content:
Geoffrey the butler was doing his usual duties in the banks house, cleaning rooms, making food and more. When he got to the living room he noticed an odd package on the table.

Without any hesitation he opened the package and saw a drink. I've worked hard today he thought to himself before drinking the drink. Only a few seconds later he noticed he was getting smaller.

He kept shrinking until he was about 10 inches tall. Geoffrey started panicking when all of a sudden he heard a voice saying "Hello I'm back".

Who's voice was it?
131221.title: Geoffrey

"What are you doing here Jazz I'm about to go to school"? "I know I'm just gonna stay here while you're gone, by the way wheres hilary? Jazz said before he was thrown out by Uncle Phil and everyone started leaving.

This time though Jazz was thrown into a bush that caused him to start shrinking. He called out for help but nobody could hear him until he shrank to 1/2 a foot. He jumped out of the bush and ran towards the house before being spotted by someone.

131231.content:
Vivian was tired after returning home from her dance class so she went to the fridge and
grabbed one of her favourite drinks and laid down on the sofa on the living room. She ended
up falling asleep and when she awoke she realised she had shrunk down to 5 inches tall.

She then heard the voice of one of her daughters entering the room. Who entered the room?
131231.title: Vivian

1312311.content:
Hilary walked into the living room just after her mom had shrunk. "Mom" she
called out but there was no reply. "That's weird, I'm sure she just walked in"
Hilary said to herself. She grabbed a water bottle from the fridge and sat down on the
couch. Hilary was wearing a blue tank top with white short shorts and a white pair of
trainers. Vivian realised that she must have just come back from the gym.

Vivian decided that she would try to get Hilary's attention or she may be shrunken
for a very long time. She starts to run towards Hilary trying to be seen by her daughter.
Does Hilary see her mom coming towards her?
1312311.title: Hilary

13123111.content:
Hilary sees something small running in her direction. "What is that"
she said to herself. "Looks like a bug" and she stands up and tries
crushing it with her trainers. Vivian notices this and quickly ducks out
of the way, almost being crushed to death. She screams out "HILARY"!!!.

Hilary hears a faint voice and stops what she's doing. She recognises the
voice as her mom's and says to her. "Mom...is that you"? with a shocked
look on her face. "Yes it is dear", her mom replies. "How did you get so small"?
Hilary asked. "I don't know, I got back from dance class and had a drink, then
I fell asleep and woke up shrunk and then you walked in" Vivian explained.

"Hilary, can you help me get back to my normal size again", Vivian asked?
Does Hilary help her mom out or not?
13123111.title: Yes

"I'll help you Mom, if you get me a new bag and a new outfit", Hilary told her mom.

Vivian knew she was in trouble and took her chances at running away. She had only gotten as far

the gym, and you're making me run again, my body is aching and I've figured out a way to punish you".
"I'm going to make you do whatever I ask you and you can start by..."

Her feet or her ass?

1313.content:
*Story set just after Knowledge is Power. The episode where Will and Carlton force Hilary to
do what they want or they'll tell her parents that she dropped out of education*


Hilary had just told her parents that she dropped out of college, she wanted to keep it from
them but Will and Carlton blackmailed her to do whatever they said or they would tell on her.
She was in her room after she just got grounded and she only had one thing on her mind,
revenge. She promised herself that she would make them both pay for what they did and she
had plenty of time to think about it whilst she was grounded in her room for a while.

It took a while but she had finally come up with the perfect idea for revenge. "Since they were
mean to me and made me feel small, I'm going to do the same to them". With that, she went on
the internet and started looking for ways to shrink people. A few weeks passed and Hilary was
finally ungrounded. She left her room and made her way to the kitchen when she was cut off by
Carlton and Will.

"Hilary, we're sorry for getting you grounded", they said, "No problem", Hilary replied acting nice
to them so they wouldn't suspect anything weird. The family was in the kitchen when a package

Ross heard the footsteps and saw that Monica had returned home. His little sister now towered over him and didn't even know it. She was wearing a white tank top with black jogging bottoms and a pair of black trainers.

Ross could tell she had just come back from the gym. He needed to try get her attention so she could help him. She sat down on the sofa so Ross tried then.

He started climbing the sofa, he got up and started running towards Monica. He got there and started waving his hands up and down so he could be seen.

Monica looked and immediately recognised her brother in his shrunken state. "Ross, what happened to you", she said shocked. "I had a drink from your fridge and this happened ", he replied.

"That'll teach you to come in my house without my permission", Monica said sternly. "You can lecture me after but right now I need your help", Ross said.

The guys tried to resist smelling it. Danny wasn't aware that Kimmy had taken her shoes off, and he could smell her feet even from far away. He bent down covering his face, trying to stop smelling. DJ took a few sniffs wondering what that smell was. She turned her chair around.

"Aww Kimmy why'd you take your shoes off." She said disgusted. Then, she grabbed the air freshener on the desk and sprayed it around her. It made the smell a little better. But it did not help Jesse and Joey. They could not take the smell anymore. They ran out from under the bed and towards the door. Danny saw them running away, and realized he should do the same. Trying to get their attention was futile. He ran towards the door. Does Kimmy see him?
14332111.title: Kimmy

143321111.content: Does she mistake him as a bug?
143321111.title: Yes

143321112.content:
He managed to run passed Kimmy's smelly feet and join Jesse and Joey outside.

"That was close. I guess we need to get Stephanie's help then." Joey said and they headed for her room. After a long walk they reached their room. Stephanie was sitting on the bed reading a book, and Michelle was sitting at a table playing. They decided to get help from
143321112.title: No

1433211121.content:
"Think we'll get their attention?" Danny said.

"I don't know, but we have to try." Jesse said and started climbing the bed. Danny and Joey did the same. After a long climb, they finally reached the top of the bed. Stephanie had her shoes off, revealing her pink socks. The smell was a lot less worse than Kimmys. Danny slowly walked forward to her feet. He started tickling her. Stephanie itched the spot without taking her eyes off the book.

"Here how about we all try tickling." Jesse suggested and they all tickled her foot. Stephanie finally took her eyes off the book and spotted them. She brought her face closer and was shocked.

"Stephanie! Help us!" they all yelled.

"Dad?! Joey?! Uncle Jesse?!" she bellowed. "How'd you get so small?"

"What are you talking about?" Michelle curiously asked and walked towards the bed. "Woah! Daddy you're so tiny."

"We know! You have to go get Becky's help!" Danny yelled.

Do they listen to him?
1433211121.title: Stephanie

15.content: Since this wasn't on either of the sitcom lists, how about the US version of the office.
15.title: Other

151322.content: Do you want to stick with Ryan or choose a different person?
151322.title: Ryan

1513221.content: One day, Ryan is at his desk working his crappy temp job doing some collating for Michael when suddenly after taking an unusual tasting sip of coffee, he feels a weird tingling sensation and before he knows it, he's shrunk down to 1 inch, completely nude in his now over sized office chair. He suddenly hears booming footsteps and looks up to see...
1513221.title: Stick with Ryan

choices: I have a new office aide
15132211.content:
Ryan looks up to see the gargantuan redhead that is now Pam Beezley. "Ryan, Michael wanted me to come check up on your progress on those files he wanted collated." She looks around his desk with a clear look of irritation when, right as she's about to walk away she notices a small toy figurine on Ryan's chair and leans down for a better look. Suddenly she gasps and steps back to realize that it's a tiny Ryan! She walks back to the chair and scoop Ryan up in her hand bring him to eye level. "Ryan-what happened!" she screams. "OMG-does Michael know"

Ryan shakes his head in response and suddenly Pam gets a devious smile to her face, "Well then, looks like....
15132211.title: Pam

15132212.content:
Ryan looks up and sees a gigantic Kelly looking down at him. She is smiling mischievously.

“What the hell happened to me? Ryan asks.

“I put a shrinking formula in your drink, so I can have you to myself.” Kelly responds.

“You’re crazy. I’m outta here.” Ryan says.

Kelly starts laughing and watches Ryan run. As soon as he gets to the end of his chair, Kelly picks him up and brings him closer to her massive face. She plants a wet kiss on Ryan.

Trying to wipe himself off, Ryan says, “You’re crazy Kelly! Put me down!”

“As you wish!” Kelly says while dropping him into...
15132212.title: Kelly

15133.content:
So a girl shrinks, but which one.

Is it...
15133.title: One of the girls

151332.content: Could it be Angela, the cat lover?
151332.title: Other

152.content: How about a category for Netflix.
152.title: Netflix shows

1522.content: How about the sequel to Full House?
1522.title: Fuller House

choices: One of his mom's friends, Ellie or Laurie
15222121.content:
Travis was coming home for the weekend from college. He walked inside and no one appeared to be home,
so he laid on the couch and went to sleep. When he woke back up, he was on the floor and everything was huge.
He had shrunk to 4 inches tall.

Before he could figure out anything else, he heard some booming noises
and saw someone walking in. It was.
15222121.title: Travis

1522222.content: What about Fresh Off The Boat?
1522222.title: Fresh Off The Boat

152222221.content: Who should shrink? One of the girls or the guys?
152222221.title: Yes

1523.content: How about a category for Disney+ and as an added bonus instead of shrinking a TV show's characters they'll grow of course?
1523.title: Other streaming service

info.description: Stories about characters shrinking in various shows
